articles.content:
Function Held by Tri-continental Solidarity Organization 
    Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A function of laying a floral basket before the portrait of President Kim Il Sung was held by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America (OSPAAL) on Oct.12 on the occasion of the 59th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Present there were Humberto Hernandez, secretary general of the Executive Secretariat of the OSPAAL, officials of the organization, the DPRK ambassador e. p. to Cuba and staff members of its embassy.    
 The participants laid the floral basket before the portrait of the President and paid tribute to him.
